channel.title: Clients
channel.description: If i want to change the back ground of the client and like the stuff in it how do i do that and make clan chats work. not the one where you have to type in a command the 1 like real rs. i got that but it don't work [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] This section is for the development of servers, this can be helping someone with a problem they have with their [b]server[/b] or posting code snippets to improve [b]servers[/b], nothing else.[/center]

item.title: Clients
item.dc:creator: @HahBahGee HahBahGee
item.description:
@HahBahGee wrote:

Well if I understood you right, you need to go to the picture of the background inside the client, and take another picture that yo want for the background, crop the picture, and paste it in over the old picture, make sure its the same size…

then save it, compile it and run, that should work…

I currnetly have no clue how to make clan chat work, but I think its server sided…

Read full topic
